line_1: They thought it proper to alight.
line_2: 'Till well nigh tir'd at almost Night,

line_1: The Miller cries, and makes the Boy alight;
line_2: Truly, the Gentlemen are in the right,

line_1: Stay, bright inhabitant of air, alight,
Spirits of spleen from yonder pile alight;
line_2: Methinks I see, and sicken at the sight,
To do what's decent, and what's right;
